languages.text: "Я равнялась на тебя, следовала каждому твоему слову. Если бы только я догадалась ослушаться тебя в решающий момент..."

traits.locale_text: "Я равнялась на тебя. Следовала каждому твоему слову. Терпела каждую волность. Если бы только у меня хватило мозгов ослушаться тебя в решающий момент..."

languages.text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."
languages.original_text: "Я равнялась на тебя, следовала каждому твоему слову. Если бы только я догадалась ослушаться тебя в решающий момент..."

traits.locale_text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."
"I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."
"I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."
"I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."
"I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."
"I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."

languages.text: «Le admiraba. Seguí cada una de sus palabras. Si hubiera sido lo bastante inteligente como para desafiarle en ese momento fatídico...».
languages.original_text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."

traits.locale_text: «Le admiraba. Seguí cada una de sus palabras. Si hubiera sido lo bastante inteligente como para desafiarle en ese momento fatídico...».

languages.text: 「あなたを尊敬していた。あなたの言葉に全て従った。あの運命の瞬間に、あなたに抗う洞察力さえあれば…」
languages.original_text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたを尊敬していた。あなたの言葉に全て従った。あの運命の瞬間に、あなたに抗う洞察力さえあれば…」

languages.text: “我曾对你充满敬意，你说的每个字我都认认真真地遵从。要是我能有先见之明，在那宿命的时刻违抗你的决定……”
languages.original_text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."

traits.locale_text: “我曾对你充满敬意，你说的每个字我都认认真真地遵从。要是我能有先见之明，在那宿命的时刻违抗你的决定……”

languages.text: "Ich habe zu Euch aufgesehen. Ich bin jedem Eurer Worte gefolgt. Hätte ich doch nur die Voraussicht gehabt, Euch in diesem schicksalhaften Augenblick zu trotzen ..."
languages.original_text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe zu Euch aufgesehen. Ich bin jedem Eurer Worte gefolgt. Hätte ich doch nur die Voraussicht gehabt, Euch in diesem schicksalhaften Augenblick zu trotzen ..."

languages.text: « Je vous admirais. Je faisais tout ce que vous me disiez. Si seulement j'avais eu la clairvoyance de vous défier à ce moment fatidique... »
languages.original_text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous admirais. Je faisais tout ce que vous me disiez. Si seulement j'avais eu la clairvoyance de vous défier à ce moment fatidique... »

languages.text: "Sana hürmet ettim. Söylediğin her şeye uydum. O kader anında sana karşı gelecek basireti gösterebilseydim..."
languages.original_text: "I looked up to you. I followed every word you said. If I had only had the foresight to defy you at that fateful moment..."
